algo
Class Huffmaneur

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      algo.Huffmaneur
All Implemented Interfaces:
Advanceable, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FakeHuffmaneur, HuffmanDecode, HuffmanDecodeBis, HuffmanEncode, HuffmanEncode
public abstract class Huffmaneur
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Advanceable

An Huffmaneur is able to encode/decode or wathever on an inputFile and save it to an outputFile.

Author:
Franck Séhédic
